markdownRemark.html: 04-14-2021: It's mostly working again, and I yanked a bunch of images from places I really didn't feel like fixing them.

frontmatter.title: I upgraded to Gatsby 3.0 and broke all the site images
frontmatter.summary: Read instructions before you npm.  I never cared for how Gatsby does images anyway.  If the site looks broken it's because it is.
